title: Silicon Valley Sigle Family Home 3 beds, 2 baths
posting_body: There is no need to look further!
3 bedroom 2 bath home in the heart of Sunnyvale with a large kitchen for the inner chef in you.
Within close proximity to Levi's Stadium, Great America, Golf Course, Google, Trimble Inc, Facebook and LinkedIn and much more High Tech Companies.
Conveniently located near dining, shopping, parks, movie theater, major highways such as 101, 237, 880, Lawrence Expressway and San Jose Airport making your commute easy and accessible.
Address: 1215 Oak Creek Way Sunnyvale CA 94089
for more info and showing appointment
